description:
Sean Moffett’s WOW Factor Sales Success Training program is the leading sales training technology for anyone selling in today’s new economy. In 2008 the world of sales and business changed as we know it. Buyers have adjusted how and why they buy while sales people continue to sell the way sales have been made for the last 50 years. Sean Moffett’s WOW Factor Training takes the traditional sales model and flips it on its head, literally, and show’s you how to sell the way clients are buying. This shift creates advocates out of clients and ensures sales success for years to come.

Whether you sell business to business, business to consumer, have a small business, on-line store, or are looking to understand how sales have changed and how to sell for maximum effectiveness; this course is for you. Leading entrepreneurs, Fortune 500 executives, the nations top sales people, and international charitable organizations have all engaged the WOW Factor Sales Success Training program and found tremendous results and you will too.
title: WOW Factor Sales Success Training
